text_content:
Ruby Ferdianto
Singapore PR | (+65) 84351681 | rubyferdianto@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ruby-ferdianto | GitHub: https://github.com/rubyferdianto
CAREER SUMMARY:
Senior Developer and Systems Engineer with strong experience in database
development, system integration, and system automation. Skilled in SQL
programming, data engineering, and system performance optimization. Proven
ability to design and implement analytical and costing solutions that streamline reporting,
support different teams, and enhance decision-making. Adept at collaborating across
functions to deliver robust business intelligence and product costing solutions.
TECHNICAL SKILLS:
Databases: MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL.
Programming & Scripting: SQL, PL/SQL, Python.
Cloud Platforms: AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Reporting & Analytics: Power BI, SSRS, Oracle Reports, Streamlit, Dash.
Applications: Hexagon SmartMaterials, Oracle Fusion Middleware.
Tools: SQL Developer, VS Code, GitHub, ServiceNow, REST API, JSON.
Expertise: Query optimization, data integration, and performance tuning, dashboard.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:
Hyundai Motor Group Innovation Center, Singapore
Senior Systems Engineer | September 2025 – Present
• Designed and maintained integrated dashboards for logistics operation systems.
• Developed SQL-based automation and Python to improve data accuracy for
manufacturing inventory.
Air Products Industrial Gases Pte. Ltd, Singapore
Application Analyst | March 2023 – May 2025
• Designed and implemented system solutions for engineering, supply chain and
logistics operations, integrating system with SAP for procurement and financial.
• Developed workflow diagrams, interface specifications, and reports for supply chain
performance monitoring and forecasting.
• Optimized stored procedures and views in Oracle SQL to improve data retrieval
efficiency.
McDermott Asia Pacific Sdn. Bhd., Malaysia
Senior Principal IT Pillar Specialist | December 2019 – Feb 2023
• Provided L1/L2/L3 incident resolution via ServiceNow and root-cause analysis to
improve business reliability of the systems.
• Managed EPC systems architecture for multiple projects, focusing on integration.
1 | Page
Ruby Ferdianto
Singapore PR | (+65) 84351681 | rubyferdianto@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ruby-ferdianto | GitHub: https://github.com/rubyferdianto
• Developed database scripts for performance monitoring and financial data
reconciliation.
• Provided guidance to team members on SQL optimization and automation scripting.
CV. Virtual Data Tech, Indonesia
Entrepreneur (Startup) | Mar 2012 – Nov 2019
• Founded a technology consultancy, partnering with an Australian firm to deliver EPC
systems solutions for clients.
• Designed and implemented EPC modules, developed SSRS and Oracle Reports,
and improved customer service quality.
• Built a mobile app for source inspection in the logistics industry using Cordova,
Node.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, enabling inspectors to capture field
activities (including photos and videos) and integrate them with the system.
TecSurge Pte. Ltd, Singapore
Senior Application Consultant | Mar 2009 – Mar 2012
• Delivered EPC systems enhancements and technical solutions to optimize logistics
and supply chain processes.
• Developed accelerated application modules using SSRS and Oracle Reports,
reducing implementation time and operational costs.
• Reduced implementation costs through reusable templates and data workflows.
Averis Sdn. Bhd., RGE Group, Malaysia
Project Analyst | June 2006 – Feb 2009
• Developed applications based on user requirements, managed Oracle databases,
and oversaw server infrastructure.
• Streamlined operational support processes, improving SLA performance from
weekly resolution to same-day service.
QUALIFICATIONS:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Informatics Engineering
University of Sanata Dharma, Indonesia | 2004
PROFESSIONAL AND CERTIFICATIONS:
• Oracle PL/SQL Associate Certified
• Oracle Database SQL Associate Certified
• Python Developer Certified.
• Nanyang Technological University (NTU) Advanced Certificate in Data Science and
AI - ongoing.
